channel.title: Bands touring together?
channel.description:
So as I have expressed on these forums on a few occasions, I would LOVE to see Children of Bodom live in concert. Problem is, they never come anywhere near my city...which is odd seeing as we are the capital of my country :( Either way, I heard about "Black Label Berzerkus". Here is the details:
Metal guitarist Zakk Wylde will launch the Black Label Berzerkus this fall, headlined by Wylde's Black Label Society. The two-month North American tour will feature Clutch, Children Of Bodom and 2Cents, with the first two bands sharing the main support slot.
Don't get me wrong, BLS is an alright group, but still if I go it will be to see COB. So I am wondering, since I have never been to a concert involving so many bands...how much play time and how many tracks do you think COB would be performing? The tickets aren't cheap and I don't want to buy unless I think the big reason I am going would be worth it. Thanks for the help guys!

item.title: Bands touring together?
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:2, topic:356483”]do you live near toronto? satch is coming in december and is way better than cob !![/quote]I live in ottawa, so about 4 hours away. And I like a couple bands more than COB but it has just been a dream of mine for a long time to see them do a nice set list live so I jump at the first chance I get. I will listen to satch though and if I like them definitely check them out too. Thanks!

EDIT:
Oh you meant Joe Satriani. My bad I’m a little slow tonight. Definitely gonna check that out too!

Read full topic

item.title: Bands touring together?
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:1, topic:356483”]So as I have expressed on these forums on a few occasions, I would LOVE to see Children of Bodom live in concert. Problem is, they never come anywhere near my city…which is odd seeing as we are the capital of my country

Either way, I heard about “Black Label Berzerkus”. Here is the details:

Metal guitarist Zakk Wylde will launch the Black Label Berzerkus this fall, headlined by Wylde’s Black Label Society. The two-month North American tour will feature Clutch, Children Of Bodom and 2Cents, with the first two bands sharing the main support slot.

Don’t get me wrong, BLS is an alright group, but still if I go it will be to see COB.

So I am wondering, since I have never been to a concert involving so many bands…how much play time and how many tracks do you think COB would be performing? The tickets aren’t cheap and I don’t want to buy unless I think the big reason I am going would be worth it.

Thanks for the help guys![/quote]
I went to Gigantour a few years ago and COB were there along with Job for a Cowboy, High on Fire, In Flames and Megadeth.
JFAC and HoF only played for about an hour at the most each, then it was Bodom who played for about 2 hours and same with in flames then Megadeth, who was headlining, was a little longer

Read full topic
